## Meeting.default.changeVideoLayout() method

Sends request to change layout type for the current meeting for the specific participant/device only

**Signature:**

```typescript
changeVideoLayout(layoutType?: string, renderInfo?: {
        main: {
            width: number;
            height: number;
        };
        content: {
            width: number;
            height: number;
        };
    }): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  layoutType | string | _(Optional)_ a layout type that should be available in meeting constants  |
|  renderInfo | { main: { width: number; height: number; }; content: { width: number; height: number; }; } | _(Optional)_ preferred dimensions for the remote main and content streams (server can ignore it) |

**Returns:**

any
